name: Precedent
tagline: Creating human solutions to digital problems.
description:
Precedent is a digital experience company based in London, Hong Kong and Melbourne. Working with some of the most recognizable names in charity, HE, membership, finance, and the professional services sector since over 25 years, we build digital experiences, services, and brands to support our clients' digital future. We make our work human by crossing technology with context, insight, and empathy.
We aim to get to know our clientâ€™s inside out to get a true understanding of their organisational ambitions and structures. This approach helps us to become their digital partners rather than just a supplier delivering a project, positively impacting project outcomes and efficiency.
Our key services cover all stages along the digital transformation process. Starting with scoping and setting up a road map, we can guide you through strategy, design, user experience, development, hosting and support.
